abstract.text: Returns a new
matrix created by concatenating a matrix with a rotation around a vector.

inlineContent.text: The angle of the rotation (a positive angle is counterclockwise).
The axis to perform the rotation around.

abstract.text: Speed up OpenGL ES or OpenGL app development. Use math libraries, background texture loading, pre-created shader effects, and a standard view and view controller to implement your rendering loop.
Returns a new
matrix created by performing a component-wise addition of two matrices.
Returns the inverse of a matrix.

Returns the product of two matrices.
